text: Aramayis Tonoyan (born 26 October 1969) is a retired Armenian football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian footballers Category:FC Ararat Yerevan players Category:FC Pyunik players Category:Sepahan players Category:FC Yerevan players Category:FC Mika players Category:Association football defenders Category:Armenian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Iran Category:Armenian expatriate sportspeople in Iran Category:Armenia international footballers Category:Armenian football managers Category:FC Yerevan managers Category:FC Mika managers
